A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Possibly the most iconic fictional character of all time thrown away in a disrespectful inconsistent character assassination.

Multiple loose and incoherent plot lines that ultimately come to nothing.

ALL ideas introduced by the previous entry went unanswered. 
Knights or Ren\, Snoke\, Phasma\, Rey's identity\, ending of the Jedi\, nope none of that matters\, forget all of it.

Actual directorial WTF moments like Leia force witching herself out of space with no commentary afterwards.

There are pages and pages online of why this movie was shit - it's the only movie I've ever seen that literally made me wish it didn't exist.
